title: "Databases Available on Mantis"

We keep several commonly used databases on the Mantis cluster. We check for updates to these databases regularly and update them as needed. TODO: More detail about this...

## Blast 
The latest version of the BLAST databases are available on Mantis. You can use them with the `blastn` command or any other BLAST command that requires a database. Inludes custom databases constructed from latest eggNOG, UNIPROT, and orthoDB releases.

### Example:
```bash
blastn -db <blast database path> <other options>
```

### Paths to available databases
- /isg/shared/databases/blast/v5
- /isg/shared/databases/blast/v4
- /isg/shared/databases/blast/eggnog
